name: 古瓊昇
objective:
太空科技應用課程旨在介紹太空技術在各種應用領域的應用，並探討太空科技如何影響人類生活和科學研究。課程涵蓋的主題包括：太空探索，地球觀測，通訊和衛星導航，太空工程和材料科學，太空生物學和醫學，太空經濟和商業。通過這些主題的介紹，學生將了解太空科技在各個領域的應用和未來發展方向，並能夠掌握相關技術和知識。
The Space Technology Application Course aims to introduce the application of space technology in various fields, and explore how space technology impacts human life and scientific research. The course covers topics including space exploration, Earth observation, communication and satellite navigation, space engineering and materials science, space biology and medicine, and space economy and business. Through the introduction of these topics, students will understand the application of space technology in various fields and future development directions, and be able to master relevant technologies and knowledge.
schedule:
1	Introduction to Space Technology & Remote Sensing
2	Optical Imaging Systems
3	Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) Basics
4	SAR Image Interpretation
5	Preprocessing Techniques
6	Space Image Datasets & Platforms
7	Feature Extraction & Classical Method
8	Mini Project 1: SAR vs Optical Comparison
9	Review and Transition to Deep Learning
10	Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
11	Autoencoders & Dimensionality Reduction
12	Anomaly Detection in Space Imagery
13	Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL)
14	Attention Mechanisms
15    Transformers & Vision Transformers (ViTs)
16	Mini Project 2: Model Implementation
17    Final Report and Presentation
18    Final Report and Presentation
materials:
"Satellite Technology: Principles and Applications" by Anil K. Maini and Varsha Agrawal
"Neural Networks and Deep Learning: A Textbook" by Charu C. Aggarwal
consultation: Office hour or making an appointment by email
